text: Ara ye byakti tara pita-matake bale, dhika tomaderake, tomara ki amake khabara da'o ye, ami punarut'thita haba, athaca amara purbe bahu loka gata haye geche? Ara pita-mata allahara kache phariyada kare bale, durbhoga tomara tumi bisbasa sthapana kara. Niscaya allahara oyada satya. Takhana se bale, eta to purbabartidera upakatha bai naya.
